Text:
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt2072268/

according to IMDB its Russian Language

I'm downloading now so I'll let you know the language, but I'm pretty sure it's English.

The original which was in Russian and was called Likvidator I think.

It´s a Kazakh film and the audio is Russian. According to a Russian guy I know, the English subtitles are quite adequate.

Since Vinnie Jones´s Russian would be atrocious his character, what little is of it, is The Mute. 

This is standard fare. An anti-hero. Vengeance. A sympathetic cop in a currupt system. It´s good to get rid of the criminals but it has to be done "legally". You know the drill. Six out of ten.

P.S. Now I see that the director is going to do Warriors of the Steppe, which looks interesting to me being an admirer of the mongol warriors. And apparently he´s gonna get a much bigger budget.  Definitely gonna download that one.
